title: Appropriation of columns in Mosque of Cordoba

content.prompt: The Umayyad architects of the Great Mosque of Córdoba borrowed from the city’s Roman architectural heritage by

choices.label: using a dome to create a central open space

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
